title: USA
description: The United States of America is a vast land. It is home to some of the most spectacular scenery in the world and some of the most recognizable icons on the globe.

title: Iceland
description: Iceland is often referred to as the "Land of Fire and Ice". Icelandic landscapes are shaped by sand and lava fields, mountains, volcanoes and glaciers.

title: Ireland
description: Ireland is known for its wide expanses of lush, green fields. In fact, its nickname is the Emerald Isle. But there are also large areas of rugged, rocky landscape.

title: UK
description: The United Kingdom is a country with fascinating history, exciting cities, and rich cultural traditions. Historic sites are at every turn, from prehistoric megaliths to centuries-old castles.

title: Spain
description: Spain is a country of large cultural diversity. In Spain you will find from green valleys, hills and snowy mountains to almost desert zones. Its beaches are also famous.

title: France
description: France is the most popular tourist destination in the world. It is home to vibrant cities, stunning landscapes, food and culture.

title: Germany
description: Germany exhibit both a modern and classical feel. Its cities often preserve their historical appearance and have old towns with remarkable architectural heritage.

title: Italy
description: As the birthplace of the Roman Empire and the Renaissance, Italy is home to many of the world's greatest works of art and architecture.

title: Norway
description: Norway is mostly known for its natural beauty, fjords and mountains, the amazing Northern Lights and the Midnight Sun.

title: Greece
description: Greece is the cradle of art and philosophy. It is made up of a series of islands covered in white buildings, and you will also find crumbling ruins, engaging museums, and pretty coastal towns.

title: Australia
description: Australia is a diverse and fascinating country. With spectacular landscapes and a rich ancient culture, Australia is a land like no other.

title: Japan
description: Often referred to as the "Land of the rising sun", Japan is a place where ancient traditions are fused with modern life.
